name: Coches de Choque
description:
An online multiplayer stage of bumping cars, with live music performance by you.

The music is syncronized: you hear what everybody hears, so enjoy the ride!

CONTROLS

  • Mouse to look around (you can also stop moving the mouse and the game will look forward when driving)
  • W or Up Arrow to accelerate
  • A and D or Left and Right arrows to turn the driving wheel
  • Mouse Buttons to express your feelings

Server is currently EU

There are only 20 cars.

I'm using Photon for multiplayer, more than 20 people means I'd have to pay $, so for now there are only 20 cars.
If all cars are taken, please wait for someone to leave.

Be nice and have fun

A game by Ferran Bertomeu
Car colors and car-design guidance by Carla Bertomeu

A game made for #IndieDevDayJam2020

The procedural music is an homage to the great Spanish hit Los Coches Chocones by Los Desgraciaus
